trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Spokane
There were no other sightings in Spokane on or around May 31st 1968
divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my two older brothers in the woods in North Spokane when one of usesaw the disk. It was travelling horizonatally above the treetops, heading towardthe hillside. I felt that it was completely familiar, probably because ofrepresentations I saw on TV. We all watched it as it rose vertically when it gotclose to the hillside. Once it was above the level of the hilltop it resumedtravelling horizonatally and continued out of sight over the top of the hill. Weall ran home to tell our Dad. He got mad at us and told us it was just anairplane. We told him that no, it was a flying saucer. He became very angry andyelled at us that it was just a plane. So we never discussed it again.
